Class AbstractCrawlingDeltaSearchIndexer

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyLastModified, SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyNone

    public abstract class AbstractCrawlingDeltaSearchIndexer
extends BasicSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy
    This is the abstract base implementation of SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy that recursively crawls resources.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
